```{r setup}
library(DT)
```

```{r}
fname <- system.file('extdata/attributes.tsv', package = 'bugphyzz')
attributes <- read.table(fname, header = TRUE, sep = '\t')
datt <- datatable(
  data = attributes, 
  filter = "top",
  extensions = c("Buttons","KeyTable"), 
  options = list(
    dom = '<"top"B>lfrtip',
    buttons = list('copy', 'print'),
    iDisplayLength = 25,
    keys = T
  )
)
datt
```
